movie_title: Kids and climate change ⏲️ 6 Minute English
introduction: Climate change is worrying for many young people. For audio and transcript downloads, plus a quiz an

vocabulary.definition: an animal or plant that feeds off another living thing
vocabulary.example: The tick attached to the dog's skin is a parasite feeding on its blood.

vocabulary.definition: to make someone become very emotional, upset, or confused
vocabulary.example: The horror movie really freaked out the children, and they couldn't sleep at night.
Finding a loyal friend like her is like discovering a one in a million treasure.

vocabulary.definition: to delay doing something until a later time
vocabulary.example: I tend to put off doing my homework until the last minute, which causes stress.

vocabulary.definition: to decide to forget about or ignore something
vocabulary.example: She tried to push away the memories of her failed relationship and focus on the present.

vocabulary.definition: feeling worried, afraid, or depressed because of climate change
vocabulary.example: Many young people today experience climate anxiety due to the worsening environmental conditions.
